mathematica: a[n_ /; EvenQ[n] && n > 0, k_] := a[n, k] = a[n - 1, k] - a[n - 1, k - 1]; a[n_ /; OddQ[n] && n > 0, k_] := a[n, k] = k*a[n - 1, k] + (n - k + 1)*a[n - 1, k - 1]; a[0,_]=0; a[1,1]=1; Flatten[Table[a[n,k], {n,12}, {k, n}]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 02 2011 *)
